instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap People . Tap the Menu icon. Tap Manage contacts . Tap Blocked contacts . Tap the Add icon. Select one of the following options: Select from people Select the check box next to the contact(s) to block. Tap SAVE . To copy the contact information to another account before blocking, tap OK . Add number Enter the phone number to block. Tap OK .
Select the check box next to the contact(s) to block. Tap SAVE . To copy the contact information to another account before blocking, tap OK .
Enter the phone number to block. Tap OK .

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap People . Tap the Menu icon. Tap Manage contacts . Tap Blocked contacts . Tap the Menu icon. Tap Remove block contacts . Select the desired contact(s). Tap Delete .

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap Call . Tap Call forwarding . Tap Always forward . Enter the number you want your calls forwarded to. Enter +18056377249 to forward calls to voicemail. Tap ENABLE .

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap Call . Tap Call forwarding . Select one of the following options: Forward when busy Forward when unanswered Forward when unreachable Enter +18056377249 to forward calls to voicemail. Tap UPDATE .
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap Call . Tap Call forwarding . Tap Always forward . Tap DISABLE .

From any Home screen, tap the Phone icon. Touch the screen and slide left or right to display the 'CALL HISTORY' tab. Tap the Menu icon. Tap Remove call history . Tap the Menu icon, then tap Select all . Tap DELETE . Tap OK .
From any Home screen, tap the Phone icon. Touch the screen and slide left or right to display the 'CALL HISTORY' tab.
